keyMappings:
unmapAll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
map K scrollFullPageDown
map J scrollFullPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map <c-h> scrollToLeft
map <c-l> scrollToRight
map r reload
map y copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot
map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode
map gf passNextKey
map gi focusInput
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map tf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map tF LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map <c-y> LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map <c-o> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map Y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map [[ goPrevious
map ]] goNext
map nf nextFrame
map nF mainFrame
map m Marks.activateCreateMode
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map s Vomnibar.activate
map S Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map gt Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map ge Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map gE Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map <c-[> goBack
map <c-]> goForward
map tn createTab
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
map <c-p> visitPreviousTab
map t0 firstTab
map t$ lastTab
map tt duplicateTab
map tp togglePinTab
map tm toggleMuteTab
map <c-w> removeTab
map u restoreTab
map ts moveTabToNewWindow
map th closeTabsOnLeft
map tl closeTabsOnRight
map to closeOtherTabs
map << moveTabLeft
map >> moveTabRight
map ? showHelp
map gs toggleViewSource
searchEngines:
# Wiki
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# Google
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google

# Google Map
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps

# Google Image
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s

# Google Drive
gd: https://drive.google.com/drive/search?q=%s

# Brave
b: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave Search

# Github
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch

# Github Gist
gg: https://gist.github.com/search?q=%s&ref=opensearch

# Github Issues
ghi: https://github.com/issues?utf8=âœ“&q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22help+wanted%22++%s

# Youtube
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# Discord
d: http://www.discogs.com/search?q=%s&type=all

# Amazon
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s

# Ebay
e: http://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_from=R40&_trksid=p5197.m570.l1313&_nkw=%s&_sacat=See-All-Categories

# Home
home: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/home/%s

# Current Site in Google
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'

# Stack Overflow
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow

# Translate Korean
gt: http://translate.google.com/#en%7Cko%7C%s%0A
